items.headline: Carvana’s stock is falling, and Amazon is to blame

items.headline: Buy this stock as food inflation, demand for fresh produce looks set to last, analyst says
items.summary_en: Albertsons’ stock rose as J.P. Morgan listed the company as its top pick among food retailers, citing persistent food inflation and how it no longer has the pending Kroger merger as a distraction.

items.headline: Stock market may be obscuring ‘important realities’ about the U.S. economy
items.summary_en: The stock market has been pricing in a strong economy, even if “conditions are lining up to disappoint those elevated expectations,” says Bob Elliott, co-founder of Unlimited Funds.

items.headline: Lowe’s tops Home Depot with an $8.8 billion buyout deal and an earnings beat
items.summary_en: Lowe’s stock gains after it beat earnings expectations a day after Home Depot missed. Lowe’s also announced it was buying a bigger building-products company than its rival did in June.
